award_title: GOALI: Water-Based Assembly of Functional Nanomaterial Coatings for Smart Textiles
subject: Smart textiles assembly + a tool for sharing your work
body:
Hi Professor Li,

I came across your NSF project on water-based coatings for smart textiles. I love that you're tackling the challenge of getting different materials to stick together without harsh chemical treatmentsâ€”just salt and smart assembly. That's elegant.

I'm building Ouro, a platform for sharing computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable, not just a zip file buried in supplementary materials.

Curious if it might be useful for your team?

Best,
